title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications
author: Martin Kleppmann
notes: Essential reading for backend engineers. Covers distributed systems, data storage, and stream processing.

title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
notes: Foundational book on writing maintainable and readable code.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: David Thomas & Andrew Hunt
notes: Timeless advice on software development practices and career growth.

title: System Design Interview
author: Alex Xu
notes: Great resource for preparing system design interviews with real-world examples.

title: Building Microservices
author: Sam Newman
notes: On my list for understanding microservices architecture patterns.
